page.title: 06THE BLACKSMITH'S IN SUDBURY
page.content: The blacksmith's is run by Norman, Phillip and Steve. They all work in different rooms. They work from nine to ten hours a day. They shoe six or seven horses a day. They also shoe the horses from the{Meynell Hunt. Each set of{horse shoes}will cost Â£20,it will take Norman half an hour to make a set of shoes. Norman will shoe horses from a ten mile radius. The building the blacksmith's is in is a{Victorian gasworks.}Now, at the back is a shed where they store the coke for the fire. They have two vans one black, one white. The blacksmith has been a blacksmith for four years.
